AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.MainText: I am 36 years old, front-end developer, engineer and father of 2 sons :) Currently live and work in Kazan. I was engaged in the development of business card websites, freelance projects and interactive teaching materials. I have quite a lot of work experience in a team (over 14 years), including in an English-speaking team. I also have work experience (more than 2 years) as a team leader and organizer of the work of a small team (5-6 people)
AboutMe.MoreInfo: More information about me you can see in my VideoCV

Skills.Title: My skills
Skills.UsedFeatures: What I use in my work:

Experience.Title: My work experience - 14+ years
Experience.WorkXP1Text: Developer of interactive teaching material (Ministry of culture, Republic of Tatarstan)
Experience.WorkXP2Text: Senior Commissioning and Testing Engineer (Kazan Helicopters Plant, JSC)
Experience.Education6: Various advanced training courses on aviation technological topics
Experience.Languages2Text: I had been on a business trip to India for 14 months, worked as part of a warranty & maintenance team.
